participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and dedicated, Emily is focused on her goals and enjoys being active.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. i'm currently in high school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Jake loves engaging with others and making a difference.
participant_2.background: in my spare time i do volunteer work. i enjoy being around people. i am a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter.
